properties.description: Customer Address From SR FC VA sources

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FCCustomerRAW
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> VACustomerRAW
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true) ~> SRCustomerRAW
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SRCustAddressRAW
FCCustomerRAW derive(SourceSysId = 'FC') ~> DeriveFCCustomer
VACustomerRAW derive(SourceSysId = 'VA') ~> DeriveVACustomer
SRCustomerRAW derive(SourceSysId = 'SR') ~> DerivedSRCustomer
SRCustAddressRAW derive(SourceSysId = 'SR') ~> DeriveSRCustAddress
DerivedSRCustomer, DeriveSRCustAddress join(SRCustomerRAW@CustomerID == SRCustAddressRAW@CustomerID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> SRCustomerJoin
SRCustomerSelect, DeriveVACustomer, DeriveFCCustomer union(byName: true)~> CustomerMainUnion
CustomerMainUnion keyGenerate(output(id as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey
SRCustomerJoin select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SRCustomerRAW@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate = SRCustomerRAW@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = SRCustomerRAW@UpdatedDate,
		SourceSysId = DerivedSRCustomer@SourceSysId,
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CreatedDate = SRCustAddressRAW@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = SRCustAddressRAW@UpdatedDate,
		SourceSysId = DeriveSRCustAddress@SourceSysId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SRCustomerSelect
SurrogateKey sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CustomerMainSink
